articles.title: What will the Red Sox target this offseason? Craig Breslow maps out Boston’s priorities.
articles.description:
"Someone that we feel like can pitch alongside or slot in behind Garrett and start a playoff game for us."

The post What will the Red Sox target this offseason? Craig Breslow maps out Boston’s priorities. appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Red Sox aim to acquire a starting pitcher for playoff readiness this offseason.
Craig Breslow emphasizes the need for a reliable arm behind Garrett Whitlock.
Targeting strong pitchers could enhance Boston's competitiveness in the 2024 season.
